Title: Chapter Seven: Father of Lies
Writer: Jeremy Slater (created by), William Peter Blatty (inspired by the novel by), Charise Castro Smith
Actors: Alfonso Herrera, Ben Daniels, Hannah Kasulka, Brianne Howey
Plot: Marcus asks for assistance from Mother Bernadette, while Tomas has a crisis of conscience, and Father Bennett's investigations lead him into danger.
